verbs.description: The permanent clearance [V: had] been withheld from Kushner , President Trump 's son - in - law and a senior White House advisor , for more than a year pending completion of a background check .
The permanent clearance had [V: been] withheld from Kushner , President Trump 's son - in - law and a senior White House advisor , for more than a year pending completion of a background check .

[ARG1: The permanent clearance] had been [V: withheld] [ARG2: from Kushner , President Trump 's son - in - law and a senior White House advisor ,] [ARGM-TMP: for more than a year] [ARGM-TMP: pending completion of a background check] .

The permanent clearance had been withheld from Kushner , President Trump 's son - in - law and a senior White House advisor , for more than a year [V: pending] [ARG2: completion of a background check] .
